title: At the Airport
description: At the Airport explains the purpose of an airport and the steps people take to get on an airplane before traveling. Informative photographs support the text to maintain students' interest. The repetitive word pattern, simple sentence structure, and high-frequency vocabulary make this an enjoyable book for early emergent readers.
reviewWords: airline, airport, check in, planes, searched, travelers
awareness: Discriminate Initial Consonant Blend : Discriminate initial consonant tr-blend
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
